newsitem.headline: 11.3 Dev Preview Build Live
newsitem.text: You and many can now join the developer preview program and test the 11.3 update of Sapphire Launcher. Many weeks of listening and thought and a new GUI has been built to allow you to easy build a native launcher experience to your liking. Its not about the premium features, its not about being pooular or a top developer pick application, its about listening and working together. Let's build something together. Let's be different. The developer preview of Sapphire Launcher can be accessed through XDA Labs.

newsitem.headline: License Key Price Drop
newsitem.text: Basic and premiuim key license have had a price drop. Basic keys are now 1.00 and Premium keys are now 3.25

newsitem.headline: Papers Maintenance Issues
newsitem.text: Their are reports of the Sapphire wallpaper archives not loading correctly or crashing on loading all wallpapers. This issue is being tracked.

newsitem.headline: Update 11.3 schedule update
newsitem.text: Notice! 11.3 official update will be released after a temporary soak testing with the xda and google plus communities. An alpha build or dev preview will be available to try on xda labs soon. Regards

newsitem.headline: Game with the dev
newsitem.text: HMU up on the Sony Playstation 4! PSN Dracos_Aura Favorite games are Battlefield and Destiny!

newsitem.headline: GocalSD Website Improvements
newsitem.text: GSD has gone through some visual maintenance. Go ahead and check it out. More visual additions will be added soon as well as an exclusive section for Sapphire Launcher.

newsitem.headline: Ratings and Reviews
newsitem.text: Don't forget to update your reviews on google play and xda labs! If you haven't had the moment to rate Sapphire UI, take the time todo so. Ratings are part of the community focus and user feedback program and updates usually are forged and based on feedback. Let us build something together.

newsitem.headline: SUI Backers
newsitem.text: Grab an Onyx License to show off true backing support. Adds Onyx Subscriber to Sapphire launcher settings subtitle.

newsitem.headline: SUI Google Plus
newsitem.text: Join the Google Plus Group to get in on exclusive sneak peaks, dev previews, and one on one dev support!

newsitem.headline: SUI Papers
newsitem.text: Wallpapers will be updated on a monthly basis based on top picks of the android communities.

newsitem.headline: Welcome and Thankyou for your support!
newsitem.text: Enjoy your stay, Ask questions, get involved with the communities and stay active! Sapphire UI is the community custom launcher powered by google exclusively for Android 5.0+
